contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=March 2011}} {{nihongo|'''Nei'''|婦負郡|Nei-gun}} was a [[districts of Japan|district]] located in [[Toyama Prefecture|Toyama]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the district has an estimated [[population]] of 61,601 and a [[population density|density]] of 159.56 persons per km². The total area is 386.06 km². ==Towns and villages== * [[Fuchu, Toyama|Fuchū]] * [[Hosoiri, Toyama|Hosoiri]] * [[Yamada, Toyama|Yamada]] * [[Yatsuo, Toyama|Yatsuo]] ==History== *On April 1, 2005, the towns of [[Fuchu, Toyama|Fuchū]] and [[Yatsuo, Toyama|Yatsuo]], and the villages of [[Hosoiri, Toyama|Hosoiri]] and [[Yamada, Toyama|Yamada]] were merged with the towns of [[Ōsawano, Toyama|Ōsawano]] and [[Ōyama, Toyama|Ōyama]], both from [[Kaminiikawa District, Toyama|Kaminiikawa District]], and the old city of [[Toyama, Toyama|Toyama]] to form the new city of [[Toyama, Toyama|Toyama]]. Therefore, Nei District and [[Kaminiikawa District, Toyama|Kaminiikawa District]] were both dissolved as the result of this merger. {{Toyama}} {{coord missing|Toyama Prefecture}} [[Category:Former districts of Toyama Prefecture]] {{Toyama-geo-stub}}
